//The javascript attached to index.html. It must exist in the .\scripts\ folder. There's no javascript on the page at all.
//this .js file assumes some elements in index.html exists.
scripts
-> index.js

//The stylesheet attached to index.html. It must exist in .\, the base folder, beside index.html.
//index.js will change the css loaded from index.css. 
index.css

//This is the main page. There should only be selector and progressbar divs in this file, all other elements are dynamically
//generated by index.js. It must exist in .\, the base folder.
index.html
